name: Delphox BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Flare Witch
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {R} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

rule_box: Delphox BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
